title: Gov't prerogative to deport Al Jazeera journo
content:
It is the government's prerogative to deport anyone from the country if they see fit, said deputy home minister Nur Jazlan Mohamed. 

He was referring to the Al Jazeera journalist Mary Ann Jolley who was deported while in the midst of making a documentary on the murder of Mongolian national Altantuya Shaariibuu.
